question:
[Chuck] dropped off his daughter [Naomi] at the baby sitters for the night. He was on the way to the baseball game where he would meet his sister [Judy] and brother [Reynaldo]. [Martha] was excited because she was meeting her father, [Tommy], for lunch. [Leandro] took his sister [Sara] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Sara] went to the store with her sister [Naomi] [Tommy] 'son, [Reynaldo], aced his math class and made his father proud.
Question: How is [Leandro] related to [Martha]?
